00026 BdkDDalitzKsKKAmp::BdkDDalitzKsKKAmp(const char * name, 
00027                                      const char * title, 
00028                                      BdkDalitzBase * pdf,
00029                                      Int_t componentsBit) :
00030   BdkAbsDDalitzAmp(name, title, pdf, componentsBit)

00049 
00050 // initialize the components:
00051 void BdkDDalitzKsKKAmp::initResonance() 
00052 {
00053 
00054   if (nComps()!=0) {
00055     cout << "BdkDDalitzKsKKAmp::initResonance(): Cannot call initResonance more than once!" << endl;
00056     return;
00057   }
00058   
00059   // Define all RooRealVar floating observables.
00060 
00061   /* The trackinfo variable defines the cyclycal nature of the resonances
00062      and the final state pions, with the following order. 
00063      See enum ResDaughters.
00064 
00065      index   particle
00066      1       Ks
00067      2       K+
00068      3       K-
00069      --------------
00070      index   resonance   dtr particles   dtr indices
00071      1                   K+ K-         23
00072      2                   Ks K-         13
00073      3                   Ks K+         12
00074   */
00075 
00076   int a0PIndex = -1;
00077 
00078   // amplitudes and phases from hep-ex/0507026
00079   // We don't use a coupled channel model for the a0/f0!
00080   // Masses and widths are estimated from pdg listings.
00081   
00082   if (A0P & componentsBit()) {
00083     a0PIndex = nComps();  // store its index
00084     addComp("a0+", 0.46, 3.59/DEGTORAD, 0.981, 0.092, PI0_PIP, SPIN0, -1, A0RES);
00085   }
00086 
00087   if (A00 & componentsBit()) {
00088     addComp("a00", 1.0, 0.0, 0.981, 0.092, PIP_PIM, SPIN0, a0PIndex, A0RES);
00089   }
00090 
00091   if (F0_1370 & componentsBit()) {
00092     addComp("F0_1370", 0.435, -2.63/DEGTORAD, 1.400, 0.150, PIP_PIM, SPIN0);
00093   }
00094 
00095   if (PHI & componentsBit()) {
00096     addComp("Phi", 0.437, 1.91/DEGTORAD, 1.0195, 0.00426, PIP_PIM, SPIN1);
00097   }
00098 
00099   
00100   // Masses of the above daughters
00101   _mDaug[0] = 0.0;
00102   _mDaug[1] = BdkDalitz::K0MASS;
00103   _mDaug[2] = BdkDalitz::KMASS;
00104   _mDaug[3] = BdkDalitz::KMASS;
00105 
00106   // Parameters for a0 coupled channel BW
00107   _a0gEtaPi = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".a0_gEtaPi",
00108                              TString(GetTitle()) + " a0_gEtaPi^2",
00109                              0.324);
00110   _params.addOwned(*_a0gEtaPi);
00111 
00112   _a0gKK = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".a0_gKK",
00113                           TString(GetTitle()) + " a0_gKK^2",
00114                           0.329);
00115                           _params.addOwned(*_a0gKK);
00116 }
00117 
00118 
00119 RooComplex BdkDDalitzKsKKAmp::customME(Double_t m12, Double_t m13, Int_t i) const
00120 {
00121   Double_t s = kinematics(m12,m13,_trackinfo[i]);
00122    
00123   if (_typeRes[i]==A0RES)
00124     return a0Amp(s, _massRes[i]->getVal(),
00125                  _a0gEtaPi->getVal(), _a0gKK->getVal());
00126 
00127   cout << GetName() << ".customME() not implemented for resonance type "
00128        << _typeRes[i] << endl;
00129   return RooComplex(0,0);  
00130 }
